alert.note: Alert for Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:38PM CDT until July 13 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 337 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Camden, or 16 miles northeast of Canton, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sharon around 355 PM CDT. Farmhaven around 400 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near Ross Barnett Reservoir, get away from the water and move to safe shelter immediately. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves. Move into dock and seek safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
